article_title: Biosimilars Can Save Lives And Cost Less

article_metadata.description: The current rate of expenditure for healthcare is not sustainable. It is projected that in the near future 20 percent of GDP will be spent on healthcare. One way to control healthcare costs is to allow for competition from biosimilar drugs.
article_metadata.author: Capital Flows
